definitions.body: :Ez Eze 34:14 pasturage, pasture;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Ge 47:4 +; cstr. [[מִרְעֵה]] Is 34:14; sf. [[מִרְעֵהוּ]] Job 39:8, [[מִעֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 34:8;—pasturage, [[לַצּאׁן]] Ge 47:4 (J), cf. 1Ch 4:39, 1Ch 4:41, also Is 32:14; [[שָׂמֵן וׇטוֹב]] ´[[מ]]: v:1Ch 4:40, cf. (fig.) Ez Eze 34:14, Eze 34:14; Eze 34:18; of cattle Jn 1:18, stag La 1:6; = pasture, of wild ass Job 39:8; of [[כְּפִירִים]] Na 2:12 (but read [[מְעָרָה]] cave, for [[מרעה]], We Now, ‖[[מָעוֹן ]]); [[יֶתֶר מִרְעֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 34:18 (fig.).
